name: WINGS first Demo
description:
The first demo for my shmup-like, a game where you can take enemy weapons and use them against them, as well as grab enemies and throw them back at their team. 

Controls are as follows (keyboard controls not implemented, this is for XBOX360 controllers or PS4 controllers)

with PS4 Controller

X is switch weapon, 
O is dash, 
Square is throw, 
and r1, l1 is attack 
l1 is grab when empty handed

on XBOX 360, 

r1, l1 are attack, and r1 is grab when empty handed
B is switch item, 
A is throw, 
x is dash
